Default glance method

By default, sw_glance() uses broom::glance() to convert its output.

# S3 method for default
sw_glance(x, ...)

Arguments

x

an object to be tidied
...

extra arguments passed to broom::glance()

Value

A tibble generated by broom::glance()

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
